text: (napiyē!) Nīr kēṭpīrāka"allāh taṉ aṭiyārkaḷukkāka veḷippaṭuttiyuḷḷa (āṭai) aḻakaiyum, uṇavu vakaikaḷil tūymaiyāṉavaṟṟaiyum taṭuttatu yār?" Iṉṉum kūṟum; "avai ivvulaka vāḻkkaiyil nampikkaiyāḷarkaḷukku (aṉumatikkappaṭṭavaiyē, eṉiṉum maṟumaiyil) avarkaḷukku maṭṭumē contamāṉavaiyākavum irukkum" ivvāṟu nām nam vacaṉaṅkaḷai aṟiyakkūṭiya makkaḷukku vivarikkiṉṟōm
